For fire proof doors it pays to go with the experts in the field. Universal Fireproof Door Co., Inc. has been designing and manufacturing residential fire proof doors since 1924, in addition to our industrial and commercial models. All of our fireproof doors are designed in-house; a benefit of having such a large staff of extremely qualified employees. Universal Fireproof Door Co., Inc.
